mainpage.title: HOME INSURANCE
mainpage.section_body_1: Get half price contents cover for the first year when you take out our buildings cover. Offer ends 31/08/2006
mainpage.section_heading_2: NO EXTRA CHARGE FOR PAYING MONTHLY
mainpage.section_body_2: Want to pay monthly? Don't be punished. Some companies slap on an extra charge. We don't. Nothing. Nada. Zero. 0% for monthly payments (subject to status).
mainpage.section_body_3: If you've got Virgin's car, pet or annual travel insurance we'll knock an extra 10% off your home insurance. When you apply, online or by phone, just let us know. The quote we give you will automatically include your discount.
